Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Cloner = Tool.Handle
local Character local Player
local PlayerGui
local FabregeGui
local Torso local Humanoid
local SelectedFabrege = nil
local FabregeToAward
local PersistBadges local BadgeConnection
local EggIcons_List = { ['DreamWeaverFabregeEgg'] = {['Selected'] = 110685176, ['Unselected'] = 110685141, ['BadgeId'] = 110693091}, ['PurpleFabregeEgg'] = {['Selected'] = 110685266, ['Unselected'] = 110685222, ['BadgeId'] = 110692797}, ['DragonFabrege'] = {['Selected'] = 110685357, ['Unselected'] = 110685335, ['BadgeId'] = 110693177}, }
local FontSizes = { Enum.FontSize.Size18, Enum.FontSize.Size14, Enum.FontSize.Size18, Enum.FontSize.Size24, }
local function IsFabEgg(badgeId) for eggName, eggList in pairs(EggIcons_List) do if eggList['BadgeId'] == badgeId then return eggName end end return nil end
local function ShowNotification(eggName) local gui = Instance.new('ScreenGui') gui.Name = 'FabGui' gui.Parent = PlayerGui print(PlayerGui, " is nil")
local tLabel = Instance.new('TextLabel') tLabel.Font = Enum.Font.ArialBold tLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(54/255, 96/255, 192/255) tLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 20) tLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 tLabel.Parent = gui tLabel.Text = "Congratulations! You just cloned yourself a " .. eggName tLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -100, 0, 150) tLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size18
local lastTick = tick() local count = 0 Game:GetService('Debris'):AddItem(gui, 4.5) end
local function CreateGui() FabregeGui = Instance.new('ScreenGui') FabregeGui.Parent = PlayerGui
local frame = Instance.new('Frame') frame.Name = 'SelectorFrame' frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 300, 0, 100) frame.Parent = FabregeGui frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -150, 1, -200)
for egg, eggImageList in pairs(EggIcons_List) do local eggButton = Instance.new('ImageButton') eggButton.Name = egg eggButton.Parent = frame eggButton.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. eggImageList['Unselected'] eggButton.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 eggButton.Size = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 100) eggButton.Position = UDim2.new(0, (#frame:GetChildren() -1) * 100, 0, 0)
eggButton.MouseButton1Click:connect(function() FabregeToAward.Value = eggImageList['BadgeId'] for _, eButton in pairs(frame:GetChildren()) do eButton.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. EggIcons_List[eButton.Name]['Unselected'] end eggButton.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. eggImageList['Selected'] end) end end
local function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if Player:FindFirstChild('FabregeToAward') == nil then FabregeToAward = Instance.new('IntValue') FabregeToAward.Name = 'FabregeToAward' FabregeToAward.Parent = Player else FabregeToAward = Player:WaitForChild('FabregeToAward') end PlayerGui = Player:WaitForChild('PlayerGui') if FabregeGui then FabregeGui.Parent = PlayerGui else CreateGui() end PersistBadges = Player:WaitForChild('PersistBadges') if not BadgeConnection then BadgeConnection = PersistBadges.ChildAdded:connect(function(child) if child and child:IsA('IntValue') then if IsFabEgg(child.Value) and child.Value == FabregeToAward.Value then local egg = IsFabEgg(child.Value) ShowNotification(egg) end end end) end end
local function OnUnequipped() FabregeGui.Parent = nil end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
